item.title: Mentioned by iPolitics.ca (subscription)
item.description:
Lunch with Stoffer: “I don't want to be …a bit of a prick sometimes”
And he is tickling my ear with a puppet. “This is Buddy,” the Nova Scotia NDP MP says, matching grins with his knitted companion. Of course it is. ..... These days Stoffer seems impressed with his young caucus: Niki Ashton, Megan Leslie, Hoang Mai. But he is equally admiring of Conservatives: Larry Miller, James Rajotte, Merv Tweed. “In my 15-and-a-half years here, I've yet to meet a member of Parliament or a Senator that I wouldn't want as a neighbour,” he says. Yes – even Anders. I ask him how he has seen his ...
